price: E para que purgue os que crêem e para que extermine os renegadores da Fé.
arabic: وَلِيُمَحِّصَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَيَمۡحَقَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرِينَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: waliyumaḥḥiṣa al-lahu alladhīna āmanū wayamḥaqa al-kāfirīna
